text: Hotel Pyrénées is a four-star hotel in Andorra la Vella, Andorra. Built in 1940, Lonely Planet describes it as being "one of Andorra's few venerable buildings" and containing "haunting old photographs of Andorra in its restaurant". It originally went under the Catalan name "Pirinec" and had 36 rooms but today it has 70 rooms. ==References== ==External links== * Website Category:Hotels in Andorra Hotel Pyrenees Category:Hotel buildings completed in 1940 Category:Hotels established in 1940
title: Hotel Pyrénées
